parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the desired arrow head where the index begins at zero

title: IDisplayData.GetArrowHeadAtIndex

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the desired arrow head where the index begins at zero

remarks:
The return value is the following array of doubles:
[
arrowHeadPt[3], arrowHeadDir[3], arrowHeadWidth, arrowHeadHeight, arrowHeadStyle
]
where:
arrowHeadPt[3]
XYZ arrow head tip location
arrowHeadDir[3]
XYZ arrow head direction
arrowHeadWidth
Arrow head width measured along the arrow head direction
arrowHeadHeight
Arrow head height
arrowHeadStyle
Arrow head style as defined in
swArrowStyle_e
